title: Warriors coach Kerr takes leave of absence
text: Warriors coach Kerr takes leave of absence Thursday, 1 October 2015 (6 minutes ago) Warriors coach Kerr takes leave of absence Recent related news The Golden State Warriors announced today that Head Coach Steve Kerr, who underwent surgery on his back to repair a ruptured disc in late July and a follow-up...
